content: If you aren't aware, we publish SchemaSpy information about our database at https://guides.dataverse.org/en/latest/schemaspy
Right now we only mention in the dev guide: https://guides.dataverse.org/en/6.4/developers/tips.html#schemaspy
Hearing @Sherry Lake say, "I use them all the time" makes me wonder if we should mention SchemaSpy in more places. Maybe the Admin Guide?
